# Output Directory

This directory will contain generated compliance reports and analysis outputs.

## Generated Files

After running the compliance check, you'll find:
- `compliance_report.xlsx` - Main compliance report with all checks
- `compliance_report.txt` - Text version of the report (when Excel libraries not available)
- Additional analysis files as generated

## Report Contents

The compliance report includes:
- Stipulation ID and description
- Document section analyzed
- Compliance status (PASS/FAIL/UNCLEAR)
- Explanation of the determination
- Relevant excerpts from the document
